【Large Capacity Tank】Large capacity glass tank. Sustainability work for 1H. 3BAR high pressure steam strong decontamination leaves no stain. High pressure output and outlet temperature is up to 105℃
【Chemical-Free】Naturally deep clean and without the use of harsh chemicals using hot, to avoid chemical agents' damage to the skin. One more protection for family health

【Long Power Cord】2.2M Extra-long power cord provide added maneuverability and reach for those hard to get to places. The handheld steamer will be your best choice. The user-oriented furniture cleaner will serve you at your comfort in every cleaning project.

【Attachments】You can get 1 x Cleaning Machine; 1 x Extended Elbow Nozzle; 1 x Large Brush; 1 x Small Brush; 1 x Small Steel Brush; 1× insulated gloves. And if you find any parts are damaged after receiving product, just contact us,all your requests or problems will be solved within 12 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LIGHTWEIGHT TO CARRY Portable handle and lightweight size make the steamer easy to carry only by one hand. The tank supports adding water during working, so that the steamer can keep working for longer washing time. Multipurpose steam washing Can be used for home appliances washing, such as air conditioning washing, the refrigerator washing, washing machine washing, microwave washing. Meanwhile, this steam washing is used for hearth washing, pan washing, range hood washing, washing the wall. give your kitchen a hygienic environment HIGH TEMPERATURE FAST STEAM Fast steams out only need 15 seconds and the temperature can reach over 100 °C. NOTE: The steam temperature decreases with distance, so please keep the steam nozzle close to the surface you want to wash.

Warm Tips： If want to remove the grease add detergent please. Avoid burned of the nozzle wear gloves please . No trigger on handbar, turn off the power switch if need to stop the steam please. Sometimes steam tube loose during delivery , connect it again before use please. Sometimes nozzle loosed or dripped after long time use, change the rubber ring please which included in the accessories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars work perfectly with some concerns
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steam cleaning device primarily for tackling kitchen stove grease, and overall, it impressively lives up to its promise of quick and powerful grease removal. The steam effectively transforms the grease into a milky substance, which is effortlessly wiped away, aligning perfectly with the product description and earning it a 5-star rating.However, there are a couple of concerns I'd like to highlight. Firstly, the water refill port is positioned close to the power input, causing water to frequently come into contact with it. While no accidents have occurred so far, this design raises some safety apprehensions. Secondly, the quality of the hose connecting the cleaning attachment to the machine seems average, and I fear it might wear out or even rupture after multiple uses.In conclusion, this steam cleaning device excels in grease removal, but attention to certain design aspects, such as the proximity of the water refill port to the power input and the durability of the connecting hose, could significantly enhance the overall reliability of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with the size and functionality of the steam cleaner. I had a smaller steam cleaner, which looked like a tea pot, and its reservoir was small; therefore, it needed to be cooled down and filled quite often. This steam cleaner has a larger reservoir and appears to work for over 20 minutes, at least, on one reservoir. I was happy with the purchase. A word of caution -- the steam cleaner is supplied with a long handle, which can get quite hot, so wearing gloves are a must.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works just like it should
reviews.reviewText: It’s a bad little cleaning machine it works so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Shoots water and not hot
reviews.reviewText: It's more of a water hose than a steamer. It leaks at any setting and doesn't get hot. Your hot tap water is hotter than this. Do not buy in hopes of using on tint. I have an old clothe steamer that leaps ahead of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How suitable it is for cleaning range hoods.
reviews.reviewText: Spray the cleaner and use it with this steamer, the oil will fall off quickly, and the oil in the range hood can be cleaned in one go. It reduces my burden of cleaning the range hood and makes it easier for me to clean heavy oil areas. Unimaginably good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for cleaning grout. It does not have enough pressure to do a good job with that task. Also, too much water is released while the steam is coming out so this would not be good for projects outside the shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i usde it to clean a old motorcycle alot of grease came off great to use just wish it was bigger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot Hot Hot
reviews.reviewText: I've owned four 4 star rated steamers and this thing whips them hands down. There is no wait time, flip the switch and off you go. It's a neat size, grab and go. I'm currently doing a resto on a 4 wheeler, it's letting me get to every spot. Other than an initial small burst of HOT water, it's pure steam. It gets in, cleans, and quick dries. No puddles of condensing water.Safety first, wear good gloves.if it's shiny don't touch, trust me I know x6 (yes, I'm the guy that doesn't turn off breakers to work on the electric)
